amendment.description: Amendment increases assistance withheld from Pakistan over the imprisonment of Dr. Shakil Afridi from $33,000,000 to $66,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 85 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase assistance withheld from Pakistan over the imprisonment of Dr. Shakil Afridi from $33,000,000 to $66,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A082) Agreed to by recorded vote: 387 - 33 (Roll no. 331).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meadows amendment (A082) Agreed to by recorded vote: 387 - 33 (Roll no. 331).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A082) offered by Mr. Meadows.
